Hi, does it feel like a skip beat, flutter, extra beatIf so sounds like either PVC or pacs they are harmless and cause your heart no damageI have them as many others and they come and go, yes they scare us but they do no harmHow long since you had all those test?If it keeps doing it ask your dr for a heart monitor that you wear and it records all your heart does you can wear it up to 30 days if need to
